mean_cn: v. 委派…为代表，授权；  n. 代表
mean_en: to give (control, responsibility, authority, etc.) to someone; to entrust duties, rights, etc. to sb
word_etyma: de去 + legate使节 → delegate 代表
short_phrase: He delegates a huge task to me.
sentence: Delegates from both nations signed the peace agreement.
sentence_trans: 两个国家的代表签订了和平协议。
